name: Super Slime Arena
description: Super Slime Arena is a 16-bit style, party-fighting game embracing equal parts accessibility and chaos. One attack, one hitpoint, all slime! Use nearly any controller in fast and frantic 2-50+ multiplayer matches across the many lands of Planet Blorb!

recommended_requirements: 建議配備: 需要 64 位元的處理器及作業系統
